about_the_game: In this free demo version of Upirja, you have to fight against all the vampires coming out from their tombs. This is a minigame included in the full version of the game. Three levels of difficulty availables.

content_descriptors.notes:
In this demo of Upirja, you will kill vampires by chopping heads, so be advised, blood and violence are shown.
This game is not suitable for children, adults only.

detailed_description: In this free demo version of Upirja, you have to fight against all the vampires coming out from their tombs. This is a minigame included in the full version of the game. Three levels of difficulty availables.
name: Upirja Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
